item.title: Rivers State Erupts: Fubara Accused of Lying, Defects to APC Amidst Wike Feud!
item.description:
The political crisis in Rivers State has escalated dramatically with Governor Siminalayi Fubara facing accusations from the State House of Assembly for allegedly making false claims regarding meetings with lawmakers. Simultaneously, reports confirm Governor Fubara's defection from the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) to the All Progressives Congress (APC). This move has fundamentally shifted the power dynamics within the state and reignited his feud with predecessor Nyesom Wike. Governor Fubara justified his defection as a "gesture of reciprocity" for President Bola Tinubu's critical support, without which he stated he would have been a "former governor."
